definitions.body: covering, large cloth spread ([[פרשׂ]]) over well to hide persons within 2Sa 17:19; fig. of protection, or of eye-screen, [[יְהוּדָה]] ´[[וַיְגַל אֶת־מ]] Is 22:8; screen, of cloud Ps 105:39 ([[פרשׂ]]).
name given (in P) to each of three screens, of tabern.:

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: ´[[פָּרׂכֶת הַמּ]] (v. ´[[פ]]), dividing off the Most Holy Place within the tent, Ex 35:12, Ex 39:34, Ex 40:21, Nu 4:5.
